title: Eternal Beat
tagline: Their time is endless, but their mission is not.
mpaa_rating_content: This film contains some material that may be inappropriate for children under 13. Includes intense sequences of supernatural action, brief strong language, and thematic elements.
critic_review: Eternal Beat delivers a thrilling supernatural ride combined with a poignant exploration of immortality's allure and pitfalls. Stanwok and Cumberbatch's performances are electric, offering a compelling dynamic that's bolstered by Truffle's intriguing support. While it plays it safe within the PG-13 boundaries, J.J. Apebrams's direction ensures that the film's pulse never falters, making it an engaging watch for both teens and adults.
description: In a world where the secret to immortality lies within the pulse of time itself, Barbara Stanwok stars as Dr. Eliza Maxwell, a brilliant cardiologist bound by the oath to save lives. Benedict Cumberbatch plays John Sentry, a stoic security guard with an enigmatic past. Together, they navigate the perils of an eternal life, seeking answers that dwell in the shadows of existence. Spencer Truffle lends his talent as the cunning Dr. Everett Strand, whose own quest for immortality brings our heroes face-to-face with the ultimate cost of living forever. Directed by the visionary J.J. Apebrams, 'Eternal Beat' strikes the heart of adventure as it wrestles with the age-old question: Is everlasting life a blessing or a curse?
prompt: Create a title, tagline, and Optimistic description teaser of a MPAA PG-13 rated movie. The movie stars Barbara Stanwok and award winning Benedict Cucumberbatch as the main characters. The movie also stars Spencer Truffle as a supporting character. Directed by J.J. Apebrams. A Short Film Supernatural including a Security Personnel (Security Guard/Bouncer/Bodyguard) and a Medical Professional (Doctor/Nurse/Surgeon) participating in a Immortality. make the character names of American origin. Provide what the movie contains which is the reason for the rating. The title, tagline and description should be consistent with the rating of the movie. Provide a critic score between 1 and 10 as critic_score. Provide a critic review as critic_review. Output result as json, title as the title property, tagline as the tagline property, rating as mpaa_rating, rating reason as rating_content, assign it a single word genre as genre, description as the description property.
